event title: Golden Age House Party ft. Ari Kiko, Lina, Froggi, Artefacts, Disco Dora & Special Guest
event description: Our favourite series, the Golden Age House Party, returns for the third time under the guidance of Ari Kiko and Lina!

event title: WIP X DRNKS: APERIRIE Ft. George Kristopher "WINE & WAX"

event title: CG DISCS presents: Flux State Live on the Golden Stage
event description: Blurring the lines of traditional instrumental roles within a live band, their focus is experimentation while making you dance.
